short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: uShare, a browser extension that helps you share a url by just scanning a QR Code. Fast. Simple.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal extension that helps you share urls by a QR Code. It generates a QR including the url of the current tab, so, you can scan it from your phone and get to the page in seconds.

uShare is open-source @ github.com/billvog/ushare
